docs.snippet: Mayor WOOD is turning his attention to the healing art. He is becoming anxious for the health and prosperity of the Democratic Party. Not repenting of his own agency in dividing and distracting it hitherto, but consoled therefor by the personal...
docs.lead_paragraph: Mayor WOOD is turning his attention to the healing art. He is becoming anxious for the health and prosperity of the Democratic Party. Not repenting of his own agency in dividing and distracting it hitherto, but consoled therefor by the personal profit he has reaped from the process, he is now intent on healing its divisions, and adopting some policy which shall prevent the spoils of office from passing into other hands.

docs.snippet: The United States Mail steamship Cahawba, J. W. SMITH, Commander, from New-Orleans and Havana, arrived here Wednesday morning at 11  O'clock, in three days and twenty-three hours from Havana.

headline.main: From Havana.; ARRIVAL OF THE CAHAWBA MERCANTILE INTELLIGENCE.

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States Mail steamship Cahawba, J. W. SMITH, Commander, from New-Orleans and Havana, arrived here Wednesday morning at 11 O'clock, in three days and twenty-three hours from Havana.

docs.snippet: Unless as the philosophic WIGFALL declares  "poverty is a crime," we see no valid reason why measures for the preservation of the public health should not be as promptly adopted, and as thoroughly executed, in those quarters of this great town which...
docs.lead_paragraph: Unless as the philosophic WIGFALL declares "poverty is a crime," we see no valid reason why measures for the preservation of the public health should not be as promptly adopted, and as thoroughly executed, in those quarters of this great town which are occupied by the laboring poor as in the more aristocratic precincts of wealth and leisure. docs.snippet: One of the Montreal papers is in a quandary. "The passengers by the train from NewYork," says the puzzled journal, "arrived last night; the mails did not. What is the reason?" The phenomenon may easiest be accounted for by supposing that they were...
docs.lead_paragraph: One of the Montreal papers is in a quandary. "The passengers by the train from NewYork," says the puzzled journal, "arrived last night; the mails did not. What is the reason?" The phenomenon may easiest be accounted for by supposing that they were not on the train.

docs.snippet: A statuette of Sago-ziai-mon, one of the Secretaries of the Japanese Embassy, has been executed by an artist in Washington.
docs.lead_paragraph: A statuette of Sago-ziai-mon, one of the Secretaries of the Japanese Embassy, has been executed by an artist in Washington.
